properties.entry: select b.code, hp.hotel_code from pushcore.hotel_property_subscription hps inner join pushcore.hotel_property hp on hp.id = hps.hotel_property_id inner join pushcore.brand b on b.id = hp.brand_id inner join pushcore.channel c on c.id = hps.channel_id inner join pushcore.sga s on c.sga_id = s.id where s.name = ?

select b.code, hp.hotel_code, p.rpc, p.rtc, p.rrp from pushcore.hotel_property_subscription hps inner join pushcore.hotel_property hp on hp.id = hps.hotel_property_id inner join pushcore.brand b on b.id = hp.brand_id inner join pushcore.channel c on c.id = hps.channel_id inner join pushcore.products p on p.property_id = hp.id inner join pushcore.sga s on s.id = c.sga_id where s.name = ?;
select c.id from pushcore.channel c inner join pushcore.sga s on s.id = c.sga_id where s.name=?
select id from pushcore.suppliers where UPPER(short_code) = ?
select id from pushcore.brand where code = ? and supplier_id = ?
select hp.id from pushcore.hotel_property hp inner join pushcore.brand b on b.id = hp.brand_id where b.code =? and hp.hotel_code=?
INSERT INTO pushcore.brand (supplier_id, consumer_count, code, topic) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT id FROM pushcore.sga WHERE name=?
INSERT INTO pushcore.sga (name, matching_qualifier) VALUES(?,?);
SELECT id FROM pushcore.hotel_property WHERE hotel_code=? AND brand_id=?
INSERT INTO pushcore.hotel_property (hotel_code, brand_id) VALUES(?, ?)
SELECT id from pushcore.nrc n WHERE n.sga_id=? AND n.rpc=?
INSERT INTO pushcore.nrc (rpc, sga_id, ccn, rpi) VALUES(?, ?, NULL, 'N');

INSERT INTO pushcore.shopping_profile (sga_id, brand_id, property_id, active, created_ts, modified_ts, matching_qualifier,maxlos, maxnrcs, maxadults, maxchilds, maxrooms, rolling_interval, distribution_inventory_count) VALUES(?, ?, ?, 1, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT id FROM pushcore.shopping_profile WHERE sga_id=? AND brand_id=? AND property_id=?
UPDATE pushcore.shopping_profile set maxadults=?,maxchilds=? where id=?
SELECT profile_id FROM pushcore.shopping_profile_rates WHERE profile_id=? AND nrc_id=?
INSERT INTO pushcore.shopping_profile_rates (profile_id, active, created_ts, modified_ts, nrc_id) VALUES(?, 1, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT profile_id FROM pushcore.shopping_profile_guests WHERE profile_id=? AND adult=? and child=?
INSERT INTO pushcore.shopping_profile_guests (profile_id, active, created_ts, modified_ts, adult, child, child_ages) VALUES(?, 1, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT id from pushcore.channel where name=?
SELECT id from pushcore.hotel_property_subscription WHERE channel_id=? AND hotel_property_id=?
INSERT INTO pushcore.hotel_property_subscription (channel_id, hotel_property_id) VALUES(?,?)
SELECT id from pushcore.property_groups WHERE group_id=? AND property_id=?
INSERT INTO pushcore.property_groups (group_id, property_id) VALUES(?,?)
SELECT pg.id FROM pushcore.property_groups pg join groups g on g.id = pg.group_id join pushcore.hotel_property hp on hp.id = pg.property_id WHERE hp.hotel_code=? AND g.name=?
SELECT id FROM pushcore.groups WHERE name=?
DELETE FROM pushcore.shopping_profile where id=?
DELETE FROM pushcore.shopping_profile_guests where profile_id=?
DELETE FROM pushcore.shopping_profile_rates where profile_id=?
DELETE FROM addl_guest_room WHERE brand=:brand AND pid=:pid AND guest_room_id=:guestRoomId
DELETE FROM addl_guest_room_ml WHERE brand=:brand AND pid=:pid AND guest_room_id=:guestRoomId
DELETE FROM addl_room_amenity WHERE brand=:brand AND pid=:pid AND guest_room_id=:guestRoomId
select rpc from pushcore.supplier_rpc_mapping where supplier_rpc=?
select rpc from pushcore.supplier_rpc_mapping where supplier_rpc=?

select b.code from pushcore.brand b join pushcore.hotel_property hp on hp.brand_id = b.id join pushcore.hotel_property_subscription hps on hps.hotel_property_id = hp.id join pushcore.channel c on c.id = hps.channel_id join rezgain_channel_mapping rcm on rcm.channel_id = c.id where hp.hotel_code = ? and rcm.rezgain_channel_name = ?;

select bd.utc_date,bd.sga,bd.brand,bd.pid,bd.requests,bd.booking_requests,bd.errors,COALESCE(be.error_type,'R8CHG') REASON, case WHEN be.error_count > 0 THEN be.error_count ELSE ceil(bd.requests::decimal/2) END AS ACTUAL_ERROR_COUNT from booking_detail bd left join booking_error be on bd.sga = be.sga and be.utc_date = bd.utc_date and be.brand=bd.brand and be.pid=bd.pid where bd.sga=:sga and bd.utc_date > :utcDate AND (bd.completed_bookings = 0 AND bd.completed_cancels = 0 or bd.errors > 0)

select b.code BRAND,hp.hotel_code PID,s.name SGA,c.name CHANNEL,uum.ud_url UDURL,GROUP_CONCAT(distinct n.rpc order by n.rpc SEPARATOR ',') RATES from pushcore.shop_profile_property spp inner join pushcore.shop_profile_nrcs spn on spn.shop_profile_id = spp.sp_id inner join pushcore.sga s on s.id = spp.sga_id inner join pushcore.channel c on c.sga_id = spp.sga_id inner join pushcore.brand b on b.id = spp.brand_id inner join pushcore.hotel_property hp on hp.id = spp.property_id inner join pushcore.hotel_property_subscription hps on hps.hotel_property_id = spp.property_id inner join pushcore.ud_url_mapping uum on uum.sga_id = s.id inner join pushcore.nrc n on spn.nrcs_id = n.id where s.name=:sga group by b.code,hp.hotel_code,s.name,c.name,b.topic
INSERT INTO pushcore.choice_prop_rates (date,action,channel,property,rate,description) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

update pushcore.shopping_profile set maxnrcs=? where id in (select sp.id from pushcore.shopping_profile sp inner join pushcore.shopping_profile_rates spr on sp.id = spr.profile_id inner join pushcore.shopping_profile_guests spg on sp.id = spg.profile_id inner join pushcore.sga s on s.id = sp.sga_id inner join pushcore.channel c on c.sga_id = sp.sga_id inner join pushcore.brand b on b.id = sp.brand_id inner join pushcore.hotel_property hp on hp.id = sp.property_id inner join pushcore.nrc n on spr.nrc_id = n.id inner join pushcore.hotel_property_subscription hps on hps.hotel_property_id = hp.id inner join pushcore.rezgain_channel_mapping rcm on rcm.channel_id = c.id inner join pushcore.brand_channel_rule bcr on bcr.brand_id = b.id inner join pushcore.suppliers_config sc on sc.brand_id = b.id where s.name=? and b.code=? and hp.hotel_code=? group by hps.id,hps.hotel_property_id,b.code,hp.id,hp.hotel_code,s.name,c.name,b.topic, sp.id,rcm.rezgain_channel_id,rcm.rezgain_channel_name,hps.channel_id order by sp.id)
select hpcm.id from pushcore.hotel_property_channel_mapping hpcm where hpcm.channel_id=? and hpcm.hotel_property_id=?
insert into pushcore.hotel_property_channel_mapping(channel_hotel_code, status, channel_id, hotel_property_id) values (?,?,?,?);

INSERT INTO pushcore.sma_analytics (txn_type, brand, pid, channel_rpc, channel_rtc, rpc, rtc, cin, cout, room, adult, child, lta, nights, price, status, error_code, hostname, event_ts) VALUES(:txnType, :brand, :pid, :channelRpc, :channelRtc, :rpc, :rtc, :cin, :cout, :room, :adult, :child, :lta, :nights, :price, :status, :errorCode, :hostname, :eventTs)

select hp.hotel_code,sp.maxnrcs, count(*) as ratecount from pushcore.shopping_profile sp inner join pushcore.sga s on s.id = sp.sga_id inner join pushcore.shopping_profile_rates spr on spr.profile_id = sp.id inner join pushcore.hotel_property hp on hp.id = sp.property_id where s.name=? and hp.hotel_code=? group by sp.id
UPDATE pushcore.shopping_profile set maxnrcs=? where id=?

select s.name `SGA`, b.code `BRAND`, hp.hotel_code `PID`, c.name `CHANNEL`, sp.maxlos `MAXLOS`, sp.maxnrcs `MAXNRCS`, sp.maxrooms `MAXROOM`, sp.matching_qualifier `MATCHINGQ`, sp.maxadults `MAXADULT`, sp.maxchilds `MAXCHILD`, sp.rolling_interval `INTERVAL`, sp.distribution_inventory_count `DISTRIBUTIONINVENTORYCOUNT`, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct n.rpc order by n.rpc SEPARATOR ',') `RATES`, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct g.name order by g.name SEPARATOR ',') `GROUP`, hpcm.channel_hotel_code `OTAHOTELCODE` from pushcore.shopping_profile sp inner join pushcore.sga s on s.id= sp.sga_id inner join pushcore.brand b on b.id =sp.brand_id inner join pushcore.hotel_property hp on hp.id =sp.property_id inner join pushcore.shopping_profile_rates spr on spr.profile_id = sp.id inner join pushcore.nrc n on n.id = spr.nrc_id inner join pushcore.channel c on c.sga_id = s.id inner join pushcore.hotel_property_subscription hps on hps.hotel_property_id = sp.property_id and hps.channel_id = c.id left join pushcore.hotel_property_channel_mapping hpcm on hpcm.channel_id = c.id and hpcm.hotel_property_id = sp.property_id left join pushcore.property_groups pg on pg.property_id = sp.property_id left join pushcore.groups g on g.id = pg.group_id where s.name =? and b.code =? and hp.hotel_code =? group by sp.id
SELECT name FROM pushcore.sga
SELECT supplier_name ,short_code from pushcore.suppliers
select s.supplier_name, s.short_code, b.code from pushcore.suppliers s inner join pushcore.brand b on b.supplier_id = s.id
select s.name `Sga`,c.name `Channel` from pushcore.channel c inner join pushcore.sga s on s.id = c.sga_id
select name from pushcore.groups

select s.short_code `SupplierCode`,b.code `BrandCode`, hp.hotel_code `HotelCode` from pushcore.suppliers s inner join pushcore.brand b on b.supplier_id = s.id inner JOIN pushcore.hotel_property hp on hp.brand_id = b.id where b.code = ?

select DISTINCT hp.hotel_code `PID` from pushcore.shopping_profile sp inner join pushcore.sga s on s.id= sp.sga_id inner join pushcore.brand b on b.id =sp.brand_id inner join pushcore.hotel_property hp on hp.id =sp.property_id inner join pushcore.shopping_profile_rates spr on spr.profile_id = sp.id inner join pushcore.nrc n on n.id = spr.nrc_id inner join pushcore.channel c on c.sga_id = s.id inner join pushcore.hotel_property_subscription hps on hps.hotel_property_id = sp.property_id and hps.channel_id = c.id left join pushcore.hotel_property_channel_mapping hpcm on hpcm.channel_id = c.id and hpcm.hotel_property_id = sp.property_id where s.name =? and b.code =?
